pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":"注意：本镜像只提供 Debian/Ubuntu/Fedora/CentOS/RHEL 的 docker 软件包，非 dockerhub"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"自动安装","children":"自动安装"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Docker 提供了一个自动配置与安装的脚本，支持 Debian、RHEL、SUSE 系列及衍生系统的安装。请注意，Docker 官方不建议在生产环境使用此脚本安装 Docker CE。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"以下内容假定"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"您为 root 用户，或有 sudo 权限，或知道 root 密码；"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"您系统上有 curl 或 wget"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"export DOWNLOAD_URL="{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"
# 如您使用 curl
curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/docker/docker-install/master/install.sh | {{sudoE}}sh
# 如您使用 wget
wget -O- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/docker/docker-install/master/install.sh | {{sudoE}}sh","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"debianubunturaspbian-用户","children":"Debian/Ubuntu/Raspbian 用户"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["以下内容根据 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://docs.docker.com/engine/install/debian/","rel":"nofollow","children":"官方文档"}]," 修改而来。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"如果你过去安装过 docker，先删掉："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"for pkg in docker.io docker-doc docker-compose podman-docker containerd runc; do {{sudo}}apt-get remove $pkg; done","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"首先安装依赖："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}apt-get update
{{sudo}}apt-get install ca-certificates curl gnupg","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"信任 Docker 的 GPG 公钥并添加仓库："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"menus":[{"title":"发行版","items":[["Debian",{"deb_release":"debian"}],["Ubuntu",{"deb_release":"ubuntu"}],["Raspbian",{"deb_release":"raspbian"}]]}],"code":"{{sudo}}install -m 0755 -d /etc/apt/keyrings
curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/{{deb_release}}/gpg | {{sudo}}gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg
sudo chmod a+r /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg
echo \
  "deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg] {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/linux/{{deb_release}} \
  "$(. /etc/os-release && echo "$VERSION_CODENAME")" stable" | \
  {{sudo}}tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list > /dev/null","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"最后安装"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}apt-get update
{{sudo}}apt-get install docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-buildx-plugin docker-compose-plugin","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"fedora","children":"Fedora"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["以下内容根据 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://docs.docker.com/engine/install/fedora/","rel":"nofollow","children":"官方文档"}]," 修改而来。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"如果你之前安装过 docker，请先删掉"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}dnf remove docker \
                  docker-client \
                  docker-client-latest \
                  docker-common \
                  docker-latest \
                  docker-latest-logrotate \
                  docker-logrotate \
                  docker-selinux \
                  docker-engine-selinux \
                  docker-engine","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"安装依赖，下载 repo 文件，并把软件仓库地址替换为镜像站："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}dnf -y install dnf-plugins-core
{{sudo}}dnf config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/fedora/docker-ce.repo
{{sudo}}sed -i 's+https://download.docker.com+{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}+' /etc/yum.repos.d/docker-ce.repo","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"最后安装："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}dnf install docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-buildx-plugin docker-compose-plugin","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"centosrhel","children":"CentOS/RHEL"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["以下内容根据 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://docs.docker.com/engine/install/centos/","rel":"nofollow","children":"官方文档"}]," 修改而来。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"如果你之前安装过 docker，请先删掉"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}yum remove docker \
                  docker-client \
                  docker-client-latest \
                  docker-common \
                  docker-latest \
                  docker-latest-logrotate \
                  docker-logrotate \
                  docker-engine","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"安装依赖，下载 repo 文件，并把软件仓库地址替换为镜像站："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"menus":[{"title":"发行版","items":[["CentOS",{"yum_release":"centos"}],["RHEL",{"yum_release":"rhel"}]]}],"code":"{{sudo}} yum install -y yum-utils
yum-config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/{{yum_release}}/docker-ce.repo
{{sudo}}sed -i 's+https://download.docker.com+{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}+' /etc/yum.repos.d/docker-ce.repo","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"最后安装："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}yum install docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-buildx-plugin docker-compose-plugin","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"openmediavault","children":"OpenMediaVault"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["本节供 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/OpenMediaVault/","children":"OpenMediaVault 帮助"}],"使用。"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"omv-env set OMV_DOCKER_APT_REPOSITORY_URL "{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/linux/debian"","codeLanguage":"bash"}]]}]

meta.title: Docker CE 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
